sub_title: Head of Italian Liaison Bureau @ Europol
summary:
Colonel of Italian State Police with 30+ years of active service, graduated in Law at the University of Padua holding a master in European Union Policy, Economy and Rights. My international career encompasses a variety of positions at senior management level. Co-author of a manual on International Police Missions I have been trainer at the European Police Academy (Cepol) for 7 years. My national career has developed in the following fields: patrol units and operational rooms, crowd control, personnel-related areas, i.a training planning, internal control, administration and international police cooperation at strategic and operational level.

Specialties: Crisis management, police reform, police cooperation at strategic/operational level. Combination of the expertise in these areas with project drafting & planning, monitoring & implementation knowledge and in-dept advisory support capacity at strategic/political level.

Available for positions as Team Leader  Chief/Dy Chief of Mission

education.field_of_study: European Union rights, policies and economy

courses.name: Civil-Military Coordination in CSDP Ops (Swedish MoI)
Common Security and Defence Policy (ESD College)
EU Policy Cycle on serious and organised crime
Figh against trafficking along heroin routes (AIDCO)
Lessons learned seminar on Cepol  Police Cmdr Course (Cepol)

profile_positions.description: HAPE Kosovo is a EU-funded project in the area of RoL with an overal budget of 6.5 meuro, a lifespan of 40 months, 6 KEs including the Team Leader, and 15 local staff. The Action started on 1 of March 2023. As designated Project Leader I represent the Lead Applicant (Criminal Police Central Directorate of Italy) and the partners of the Consortium (FR, BE, Civipol) in front of the Contracting Authority. I am also empowered to sign the contract, its addendums, side letters and manage the Administrative Costs of the budget.
profile_positions.title: Project Director @ HAPE Kosovo

profile_positions.description: EU4LEA is a EU funded project within IPA National in the area of RoL. With an overal budget of 2.5 meuro, a staff of 10 people, of whom 2 Intl. Long Term Experts the Action strives to facilitate the approximation of Albanian beneficiaries in the area of Ch.24 of  EU Aquis. The Action has a lifespan of 24 months. I represent the Consortium with the Contracting Authority (i.a. by signing the Contribution Agreement and being empowered to sign Addendums and Side Letters) and the Beneficiaries and ensure consistency of the implementation with the Action.
profile_positions.title: Project Director @ EU4LEA

profile_positions.description: With a track record of 6 projects directly drafted, managed and signed worth of 22 meuro in the last 10 yrs and 3 more to which I contributed to,  I provide strategic advice to Director of International Police Cooperation Service on the whole spectrum of EU-funded projects, notably IPA National in the WB6 and Eastern Partnership: from monitoring call for expression of interest to drafting concept notes, DoAs, budgets, WPs till consortium and project team build-up once awarded by EUDs. I am also empowered to sign contracts with Contracting Authorities and represent the Service on the spot. I supervise national presence within EUROL3 consortium in Podgorica and CH24 project in Belgrade where the Service is party of the Consortium.
profile_positions.title: Senior Advisor on EU projects

profile_positions.description: My national police experience is concentrated on patrol units, crowd control and anti-riot units, personnel issues including internal control and professional standards and training. As from december 2009 I have been redeployed to the International Police Cooperation Dept of the Ministry of Interior in Rome and later to the Criminal Police Central Directorate-International Police Cooperation Service. From June 2013 to February 2020  I coordinated all EU-funded projects (IPA & ISF) awarded to the Directorate by i.a. drafting the applications, contributing to the Consortiums build up, monitoring the selection process, facilitating the start of inception phases, ensuring coherence with national strategies, etc .
profile_positions.title: Colonel

profile_positions.description:
Head of Liaison Office at Italian Embassy in Bucharest, attache' at italian Embassies in Budapest and Chisinau. I used to deal with a variety of police/security issues at strategic/operational level both at local and regional level. Regional Coordinator of italian police attaches in E-SE Europe (14 duty places). 
As from July 2019 I was also National Point of Contact to SELEC.
profile_positions.title: Head of Bucarest Police Attache Office. Regional Coordinator East-South East Europe

profile_positions.description: Liaison with local police and prosecution authorities and police attaches from EU Member States and other States in order to facilitate cooperation in investigations and operations, e.g. extraditions, rogatory letters. Provide support to the Diplomatic Mission as required.
profile_positions.title: Police Attache' at Italian Embassy

profile_positions.description: Day-to-day management of a variety of operational issues concerning Western Balkans, e.g. police assistance (bi-lateral, EU, etc), attendance of working groups at EU level and at Interpol HQs, advisory support and attendance to the Law Enforcement Working Group in Brussels, including implementation of conclusions at national level.
profile_positions.title: Advisor on (operational) international police cooperation

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the preparation of one strategic dossier. Italian head of delegation at the Council Law Enforcement Working Party (LEWP) in Brussels. Day-to-day management of  variety of issues dealing with preparation of national positions within EU bodies, e.g. drafts proposed by EU Agencies within working Groups or CATS, COSI, preparing answers to requests from EU Member States or EU bodies, e.g. questionnaires.
profile_positions.title: Advisor on EU (strategic) police cooperation

profile_positions.description: On behalf of Criminal Police Central Directorate I provided strategic and operational expertise to the Project Leader on the whole spectrum of the Action, its implementation with the beneficiaries, the coordination with other project partners ( GIZ, CILC), the cooperation with SANCAS, EUROL 2, PAMECA 5. I directly contributed to the drafting of the Description of the Action and its budget and I was part of the negotiations with EU Commission and GIZ.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant @ IPA II Multi Beneficiary project Countering serious crime in the WB (part time)

profile_positions.description: The activity was on behalf of Criminal Police Central Directorate, Grant Beneficiary. Pameca V (6 meuro budget, 40 months lifespan and 29 staff in Albania) and EUROL 2 (3.0 meuro budget, 36 months lifespan and 10 staff in Montenegro) were technical assistance EU funded projects in the field of rule of law. Support to Anti Cannabis Strategy- Air Surveillance (2 meuro budget, 28 months lifespan and a staff of 4 people in Albania) was a global price service contract in the fight against cannabis cultivation and trafficking.I represented the Contractor with the beneficiaries (police, prosecution, Ministry of Internal Affairs and Justice) and the EUDs at strategic level providing strategic guidance to the three team leaders deployed in Tirana and Podgorica. All three applications were drafted, negotiated and the contracts signed by me as per empowerment from the Directorate.
profile_positions.title: Project Director @ Pameca 5, Support to Anti Cannabis Strategy & EUROL 2 (part time)

profile_positions.description: The activity was carried out on behalf of Criminal Police Central Directorate, Grant beneficiary. "Consolidation of the law enforcement capacities in Albania" (PAMECA IV) used to be a technical assistance EU-funded project to assist Albanian State Police and General Prosecutor Office to bring their standards, legal and operational, closer to the EU ones. The project covered six areas, i.e. 1) Structure, Organization, Human Resources, 2) fight against Organized Crime and Anticorruption, 3) Community Policing and Human Rights, 4) General Patrol and Traffic policing, 5)  Integrated Border Management,and 6) Strategic Advisory Support to Ministry of Internal Affairs. PAMECA IV had an overall budget of 4 meuro, a lifespan of 46 months and staff of 20 people (6 internationals and 14 nationals). As Team Leader I coordinated the overall activities of the project, directly implemented component 1, 3 and 6. I represented the project with all stakeholders, (EU partners, ICITAP, EU Agencies, Embassies, OSCE, IOM, etc.) and consortium partners (AT, FR, HU, CSM) and managed the project's budget with the power to sign the contract with EUD and its addendums. The application was drafted, negotiated and the contract signed by me as per empowerment of the Directorate.
profile_positions.title: Team Leader @ Pameca IV

profile_positions.description: Driver of one EU EMPACT (European Multidisciplinary Platform Against Crime Threat) project. Coordination of the planning, implementation and coordination of the activities of EU MS, EU Agencies and other IOs. Drafting of the Operational Action Plans, monitor national and project-related activities, draft reporting, coordinating the activities of the group i.a. by holding regular meetings at The Hague.
profile_positions.title: EMPACT WB driver (part time)

profile_positions.description: Short Term Expert for the EU-funded project ILECU 2 implemented by Austria. The assigment dealt with international operational police cooperation among the Western Balkan countries in the framework of the activities of the EMPACT WB of Europol.
profile_positions.title: Short Term Expert (part time) ILECU

profile_positions.company: European Union Agency for Law Enforcement Training (CEPOL)
profile_positions.description: Trainer at Cepol course "Police Commander Course" and "Strategic Planning for EU Police Missions". Invited speaker at Master in Security Studies at Roma Tre University. National trainer for italian deploying officers to EU police missions. Attendance of Governing Boards on behalf of Italy.
profile_positions.title: Trainer (part time)

profile_positions.description: The position was in the Political Section. I used to cover the following fields: strengthening of institutions, police ethics, equal representation in the police service and law enforcement agencies, corruption, organised crime, Law on police, cooperation and coordination both among police bodies and between the police and other law enforcement agencies. The position foresaw the drafting of the police section of polical criteria and the chapter 24 of the acquis communitaire yearly Progress Report, the Visa Liberalisation Reports in the "Block 2" and its monitoring with local authorities, the cooperation with all relevant IOs and police experts/attaches at the embassies and the advisory support to the Minister of Interior and the senior management of the police and the active participation in drafting, selecting projects (IPA, Twinnings, TAIEX, etc) and follow their implementation.
profile_positions.title: Police Advisor @ EUD North Macedonia

profile_positions.description: Follow the day-to-day management of the programmes developed to bring up police standards of local police to EU/Intl. ones. Advisory support on EU/Intl best standards/practices to the Minister of Interior, Chief of Police and his/her staff. Contingent commander.
profile_positions.title: Dy Chief of Programme Department at EUPOL-Proxima

profile_positions.description: Legal and operational activities to set up the mission (Brussels and Skopje). In Brussels e.g. support in the drafting of the legal documents to set up the mission to be discussed at CivCom, identifying mission needs, staffing, detailing the mandate of the EU Council into a work plan, meeting other stakeholders, in Skopje meeting with local counterparts (MoIA and police and other International partners), preparing the deployment of the staff both at Central and field level with i.a. on-site visits.
profile_positions.title: EU POL-Proxima planning team member

profile_positions.description: Providing advisory support to the italian CivCom representative on civil crisis management issues; contributing to drafting documents at the Police Unit (now CPCC), supporting the policy development of planning for EU Police Missions. Attendance at CivCom meetings in Brussels.
profile_positions.title: Police Expert. Italian Presidency
